titles.title: For the relief of Global Exploration and Development Corporation, Kerr-McGee Corporation, and Kerr-McGee Chemical Corporation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 105-222.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 4.

action.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Hatch with an amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 419.

bill.summary: 3/20/1997--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay, out of money not otherwise appropriated, specified sums to three named corporations in full satisfaction of their claims against the United States resulting from failure of the United States to grantor approve any lease or to allow phosphate mining in the Osceola National Forest.
